abstract: The United Parcel Service said on Friday that it was still talking to the Dutch shipping company TNT Express about a potential takeover, which values the European outfit at roughly 4.89 billion euros, or $6.4 billion.
snippet: The United Parcel Service said on Friday that it was still talking to the Dutch shipping company TNT Express about a potential takeover, which values the European outfit at roughly 4.89 billion euros, or $6.4 billion.
lead_paragraph: LONDON – The United Parcel Service said on Friday that it was still talking to the Dutch shipping company TNT Express about a potential takeover, which values the European outfit at roughly 4.89 billion euros, or $6.4 billion.

headline.main: U.P.S. Still Talking to TNT Over $6.4 Billion Takeover
